name: Purrturbation
description:
Purrturbation
2018. Earth is getting colder. The world’s governments managed to avoid all greenhouse gasses, so climate change got inverted. Now there is only one cyber-cat who is able to find a mysterious artifact in the future and bring it back to the past to save the world from freezing. Please help us save the planet. You are our only hope!

This game was built for the GithubGameOff 2017. As a cyber-cat you travel to the future in order to get some future artifact to save the world. If you stop moving, then you will be thrown back to the past. So keep an eye open for all things that might steal your travel-energy! 

A lot of things are still work in progress, so stay tuned for the upcoming updates.

Inputs:

Touch devices:

  • Drag and drop mice onto the cat to gain energy
  • Swipe up cat: jumping – You have to avoid obstacles like rolling rocks or snowballs (which take away 5% energy) by jumping over them.
  • Drag and drop main battery onto the battery pack: charging batteries – If you reached an energy level of more than 75% you can charge 1 of your 3  time-travel batteries which will provide the energy to travel to the future. One charge transfers 75% of your energy to a time-travel battery.
  • Drag and drop battery pack onto the cat: traveling to the future – Once all 3 time-travel batteries are charged, you can travel to the future.

Desktop:

  • Drag and drop mice onto the cat to gain energy
  • SPACE: jumping – You have to avoid obstacles like rolling rocks or snowballs (which take away 5% energy) by jumping over them.
  • ENTER:  charging batteries – If you reached an energy level of more than 75% you can charge 1 of your 3  time-travel batteries which will provide the energy to travel to the future. One charge transfers 75% of your energy to a time-travel battery.
  • T: traveling to the future – Once all 3 time-travel batteries are charged, you can travel to the future.
  • F: toggle full screen

If all your energy is gone you will be thrown back to the past and you have to put all the effort into getting to the future again once more...

Bear in mind to keep feeding the cat! Since she runs she burns her energy and slowly loses it.
